description: This file defines a PlayerFragment class for an Android application. It implements a video player UI with media controls, keyboard/DPAD support, overlay controls that auto-hide, and integrations with ExoPlayer for media playback. The fragment handles user interactions such as play/pause, seek, volume, mute, and back navigation, and displays video info and progress.

classes.name: PlayerFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that provides a video playback UI with controls for play/pause, seek, volume, mute, and overlay auto-hide, built upon ExoPlayer.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment and retrieves the Video argument.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Sets up UI components, event listeners, and key handling.

methods.name: onStart
methods.description: Initializes and starts the ExoPlayer instance.

methods.name: handleKey
methods.description: Handles key events for navigation and controls.

methods.name: togglePlayPause
methods.description: Toggles between playing and pausing the video.

methods.name: updatePlayPauseLabel
methods.description: Updates play/pause button label based on player state.

methods.name: seekBy
methods.description: Seeks the video forward or backward by specified milliseconds.

methods.name: updateTimeAndProgress
methods.description: Refreshes time and progress UI elements.

methods.name: formatTime
methods.description: Formats time in milliseconds to mm:ss string.

methods.name: setOverlayVisible
methods.description: Shows or hides the overlay controls.

methods.name: showOverlayTemporarily
methods.description: Displays the overlay briefly, then auto-hides.

methods.name: scheduleOverlayHide
methods.description: Schedules auto-hide of overlay after delay.
